alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 02 at 9:58PM EST until February 02 at 10:30PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... South central Jefferson County in central New York... Lewis County in central New York... Eastern Oswego County in central New York... * Until 1030 PM EST. * At 958 PM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Old Forge to Brewerton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions with near zero visibility associated with intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 34. Locations impacted include... Lowville, Central Square, Redfield, Highmarket, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Hastings, Constantia, West Monroe, Palermo and New Bremen. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents.
